title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Increased limits per label for disposition review and proof of disposition (U.S. government clouds)
description: This feature removes the per label 1,000,000 item limit for items pending disposition review and proof of disposition (reviewed) including record labels. Â The tenant limit of 16,000,000 total items pending disposition and disposed still exists. We apologize for any inconvenience on this late update.
